poster: T H I C C B O l
title: Did the server just crash and die?
body: Unable to login to the league server and same wiht my mate, is it just us or is it others to? the server status seems to be online.. Sooooo riot whats up? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: The servers were going through [maintenance ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) earlier this morning, but have remained online and accessible for the duration.  If you are still having any issues logging in, can you provide any additional information such as error messages you are receiving?  Looking forward to helping out if I can!
I just got back into the server. But my game gave me a leaverbuster. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Try again. It just let me in.
Same thing happening to me. It tries to reconnect me but fails to do so! You're not the only one.
